title: Tip
content: BPH reproduces faster once it has been exposed to pesticides.

title: Tip
content: There are usually fewer spiders than wasps, but predators like spiders consume more pests.

title: Tip
content: Some BPH are immune to pesticides, using pesticides only kills the non-immune BPH.

title: Tip
content: Parasitoids like wasps kill BPH by laying their eggs inside them. The wasp larvae then consume the BPH from the inside out.
